Posts.Content: Jul 11, 2018 05:54PM tetonfun wrote: My second regimen of Denice dose chemo was taxol and herceptin. I never got back hair on my legs, armpits. My eyebrows have very little hair so I had them tatooed. My eyelashes are scraggly and my head hair is sparse. This chemo occurred in 2006
Posts.Title: Permanent hair loss from Taxol? Sneakychiquita tetonfun
